text: Great place to eat. Best mixed grill and the best Indian food outside Mississauga. Service is excellent. They deliver at an affordable price unlike other Indian places.

Super Indian food in Etobicoke!  Generous, well priced food. Service is quick. 

We had onion bhaji
Vegetable samosa
Lamb vindaloo
Black lentils
Veg biryani 
Garlic naan

All excellent. Also 20% off between 5-7 pick up. Will be doing take out definitely!
amazing food. great service. The atmosphere is not up to par
